item.title: P rings and p necklaces?
item.dc:creator: @bed240 bed240
item.description:
@bed240 wrote:

just change the bonus on the necklas and ring when u wear they will make the bonus to what you want for everyweapon when ur wield them so like in item.cfg find the id for them so they will look something like this

item = [pring id][description]. 1 1 1 9999999 9999999 9999999 9999999 9999999 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 item = [pnecklas id][pnecklas description]. 82.3862713616003 82.3862713616003 91.8846446283209 0 0 0 0 0 9999999 9999999 9999999 9999999 9999999 9999999 9999999

i cba to find id and description but it will be in ur item.cfg and then just chnage the numbers liek i did were the 99999999 are wich will change the bonus for when u wield them

Read full topic
